title: Popup Menu Not Appearing in Java Editor Ruler (Photon)
description: The popup menu in the Java editor ruler is not appearing as expected.
OB: When opening a Java editor and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, the expected behavior is for a menu to appear allowing the addition of breakpoints or marks. However, the menu does not appear as intended.
EB: When opening a Java editor and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, a menu should appear to facilitate the addition of breakpoints or marks.
SR:
1. Open a Java editor.
2. Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
